snippet: Scott Ellis, 55, of Johnstown, Colo., died Saturday while participating in the grueling Leadville 100 race in Colorado’s mountains. A coroner attributed his death to natural causes.
abstract: Cyclist Scott Ellis dies of natural causes near end of Leadville 100 race in mountains of Colorado; other cycling news noted.
lead_paragraph: Scott Ellis, 55, of Johnstown, Colo., died Saturday while participating in the grueling Leadville 100 race in Colorado’s mountains. A coroner attributed his death to natural causes.

headline.main: Cyclist Dies During Race in Colorado
